thoughts.text: The 'google' command returned some relevant links about new updates and events happening in the Subway Surfers game. We can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a summary of the contents of these links and see if there is any useful information.
thoughts.reasoning: The 'google' command returned some relevant links about new updates and events happening in the Subway Surfers game. We can use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a summary of the contents of these links and see if there is any useful information. This will allow us to quickly scan through the contents of the links and find any relevant information.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get a summary of the contents of the links returned by the 'google' command and see if there is any useful information
thoughts.criticism: The summaries may not provide enough information or may be inaccurate, so we should be mindful of the contents of the links and verify the information if necessary.
